channel.title: installation Question
channel.description:
Hello
i read that to install black mesa you need to install source sdk base 2007 before you install blackmesa, what if i install source sdk base 2009 instead of source sdk base 2007?
will there be any problems? i do have a directx11 GPU (gtx470). can anyone help/answer this question.
Thnx
